channel.title: I Can't Remember! How do i change starting items!
channel.description: ugh i cant believe i forgot... how do i change the initial starting items of a new player again? :mad:

item.title: I Can't Remember! How do i change starting items!
item.dc:creator: @iam3ni iam3ni
item.description:
@iam3ni wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ryan, post:11, topic:268779”]Ok Search this in Client.Java

addItem(995, 10000);

It should take you right to the list.[/quote]

i got it thanks a bunch

Read full topic

item.title: I Can't Remember! How do i change starting items!
item.dc:creator: @iam3ni iam3ni
item.description:
@iam3ni wrote:

this is what my inv starts with

i really want to change that =[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2009, 10:10:12 pm[/size][hr]Found it!
just had to type in starter = 1;

didnt notice that lol sorry guys thanks for the help

Read full topic
item.source: I Can't Remember! How do i change starting items!

item.title: I Can't Remember! How do i change starting items!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ryan Andrew Ryan
item.description:
@Andrew_Ryan wrote:

It should look like this…

(This is mine with added items, You can use it if you want…

[code]if(starter == 0){
starter = 1;
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
addItem(1321, 1);
addItem(1189, 1);
addItem(556, 5000);
addItem(557, 1000);
addItem(558, 1000);
addItem(555, 1000);
addItem(860, 12000);
addItem(561, 12000);
addItem(554, 12000);
addItem(562, 1000);
addItem(841, 1);
addItem(882, 500);
addItem(995, 600000);

} [/code]

Read full topic
item.source: I Can't Remember! How do i change starting items!

item.title: I Can't Remember! How do i change starting items!
item.dc:creator: @iam3ni iam3ni
item.description:
@iam3ni wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ryan, post:6, topic:268779”]Try Searching if(starter == 0){ in Client.Java.

The start items are in Client.[/quote]
i found if(starter == 0){, but nothing about the items and what they start with in their inventory was there…

a new player on my server starts with 10k…which i REALLLY need to change lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2009, 10:01:50 pm[/size][hr]i wana change the starting items in the inventory :S

Read full topic

item.title: I Can't Remember! How do i change starting items!

@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“iam3ni, post:5, topic:268779”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=354664.msg2716615#msg2716615 date=1237693930]

Something tells me that you never knew how in the first place.
[/quote]How about you help someone for once instead of downgrading them, because right now since you didn’t tell him, it looks like you don’t know either.

Check in PlayerHandler.java or Player.java

what do i search tho? =\ ill look tho ive looked a million times in player.java and playerhandler.java but didnt see anything that related to starting items[/quote]Do you want to change the starter kid from ::starter, or do you want to change the equipment you start with.
